Logistics-Specific Features

Built specifically for logistics and fleet management with real-time tracking, driver communication, and delivery optimization.

🚛

Real-Time Tracking

Automated shipment status updates and delivery confirmations via voice and SMS.

GPS integration, real-time tracking, delivery confirmation
📱

Driver Communication

Number masking, secure communication, driver management
📦

Automated delivery scheduling, rescheduling, and exception handling.

⚠️
